Description: BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION !! Just completed this July 2023, this super updated and modern 4 bedroom apartment offers the best of Brighton living. PENTHOUSE unit at the top floor with a private balcony Located close right along the Green line, public transportation into the city is a breeze! Close to Boston College, the whole area has a youthful energy and is full of shops, connivance stores, grocery stores (Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Star Market, Ect.) Parking for rent, washer/dryer in unit, pet friendly, STUDENTS OK, and no broker's fee!!
